alert.note: Alert for Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Southern Big Horn (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 9:40PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Big Horn County through 1030 PM MDT... At 939 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles southeast of Fort Smith, or 39 miles south of Hardin, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lodge Grass, Wyola and Crow Indian Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Southern Big Horn
